short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Counts the number of non-whitespace characters in textboxes and places the count above them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to display character counts above text boxes. ONLY works on Professor Staley's IHS course pages.
